link-info: All paths to thumbnails, gifs, etc are relative to the root of the assets folder
name: Blasters

nlight.desc: Two steady shots directly in front, one from each blaster, on the same spot. Hitting with either guarantees a third shot from both blasters as a followup. Little force.

slight.desc: A reaching single shot with the forward blaster onto a spot far in front. Little force.

dlight.desc: A sequence of three blasts against the ground in front, starting close, with each subsequent shot slightly farther forward.

nair.desc: A very quick one-two blast upwards, roughly covering a short arc above the Legend's head.

sair.desc: A quick, reaching pair of blasts from the forward blaster, covering a narrow half-arc in front.

dair.desc: A quick and steady pair of blasts directly underneath the legend from both blasters. Hitting with these blasts results in a flurry or small blasts as a followup.

recovery.desc: A spinning, backwards twirling, kicking somersault complete with twirling of guns ending with a single shot directly upwards. Carries the Legend a significant distance up into the air.

gp.desc: Twirling guns, the Legend goes into a dive directly downwards with both blasters extended out. Hit targets take a blast from both blasters at short range.
